cv-jab-9th-december-2021.title: Crammed Discs: Made To Measure - Christina Vantzou & JAB

description:
Six hours of music celebrating Crammed Discs' influential instrumental series Made To Measure, revived in 2021 by label head Marc Hollander.
“A lemon beside an orange is no longer a lemon, the orange no longer an orange; they have become fruit. Mathematicians follow this law. So do we” - Georges Braque
